recipesJson.name: All the Pumpkin  Spice  ( made on Fresh' s Sat. show  - a pumpkin  spice ice cream )
recipesJson.author: MECH_MOD_RN
recipesJson.description:
Based on @shyndo recommendation   I pushed  **LB pumpkin Pie**  waaaaaay up there and  and tossed in  one of my favorite  ice creams  **LB vanilla  ice cream**  and  **HS  french vanilla ice cream**  for  some darker  buttery notes.   ( simple with  only 3 ingredients) 

 What you get a sweet thick vanilla cream on the inhale and full on   pumpkin spice on the exhale from a  simple mix.
This  works well in a RTA/ Subohm   and  made for the pumpkin spice lovers out there.  This will not be for everyone, but if you like full  sweet spice flavor this is  for you .  
It does not  really need sweetener, but I like it sweet and added    FLV sweetness at 0.3% 


Learn more about mixing here:
facebook - https://www.facebook.com/groups/diydownunder/
Discord - https://discord.gg/kH4Fqbc
Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTCwb7ULyfJALQlehomZZQA
website  - https://www.diydownunder.com/

reviews.text: My First time mixing with LB Pumpkin and i guess it is just not for me. I get a really strong clove note. Even made my tongue feel tingly. Also I found it to be very dry despite the 2 ice creams in the recipe.

pageContext.name: All the Pumpkin  Spice  ( made on Fresh' s Sat. show  - a pumpkin  spice ice cream )
